name: Northstar Golf Course
description: Scenic Truckee golf course nestled in the Sierras, known for its challenging layout and group-friendly atmosphere.

faqs.question: What’s included in Northstar golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, tee times, carts, and concierge planning. Transportation, dining, and add-ons available for groups.

faqs.question: How much do Northstar packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical packages range $299–$499 per golfer depending on season, lodging, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle tournaments and corporate groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—tee sheets, room blocks, banquets, and full concierge planning for groups of all sizes.

meta.title: Northstar Golf Course | Truckee Golf Groups & Stay and Play
meta.description: Play Northstar in Truckee with golf groups, tee times, and stay and play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips.
